Bronze: In allomancy, bronze is an internal, mental, pushing metal. Burning bronze allows the user to detect people that are using allomancy by sensing the Allomantic pulses that are given off by burning any metal. These pulses are only audible to someone burning bronze. The pairing for bronze is copper.
